meta.content: Tuition free Performing Arts High School in Somers Point, NJ. Chartertech High School for the Performing Arts offers CTE classes in Instrumental Music, Advanced Vocal Music, Dance and TV/Film department. The Instrumental and Advanced Vocal students are enrolled in CTE classes that focus on Music Technology with the state-of-the art, industry standard software, Protools. Both groups of students have the opportunity to get a certification in Protools prior to their graduation. In addition to having CTE opportunities, we pride ourselves on having a Real World Industry Focus; the professional artistic teachers at Chartertech focus on teaching students industry related technical skills that include lighting, sound, production, recording, engineering, set design, public relations, networking, film media design, production, and photography.
